channel.title: Pebbles on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford
channel.description: Recent content in Pebbles on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford

item.title: Pandas and bananas
item.description: Simple but fun game “Pandas and Bananas” I created for the Pebble Smartwatch.

item.title: XKCD Comics Viewer
item.description: After porting PNG support to Pebble, found a use for the 10x increase in image storage in the creation of a XKCD Comic viewer.

item.title: PebbleGL OpenGL Implementation
item.description: During a Pebble Hackathon at the office, myself and Justin McGirr endeavored to create an OpenGL implementation for the Pebble Smartwatch.
